author: gregames
msg: add return value checks for apr_atomic_add32 and apr_atomic_inc32

author: bnicholes
msg: Since all NetWare memory is shared, allowing an application access to the APR global pool allows it to allocate memory and set cleanups that will never happen even if the application terminates.
